properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v1 c1 b1 b2 e1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord You are good and
Your mercy endureth forever
Lord You are good and
Your mercy endureth forever
People from every
Nation and tongue,
From generation to generation

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We worship You,
Hallelujah! hallelujah!
We worship You for who You are
We worship You,
Hallelujah! hallelujah!
We worship You for who You are
You are good!

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Yes You are! Yes You are! Yes You are!
So good, so good
Yes You are! Yes You are! Yes You are!

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
You are good, all the time
All the time, You are good

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
For who you are
For who you are
For who you are
You are good!
